Name: ASIA CARGO NETWORK SDN BHD
Purpose of Financing: To part finance the acquisition of two (2) unit aircrafts of a Boeing B737-800 and Boeing B737-300 Freighter bearing with Manufacturing Serial Number of 29052 and 28869 and Registration Number (9M-WCA) and (9M-WCM) respectively up to ninety (90%) from the purchase price of USD25.00 million and USD11.30 million amounting to USD22.50 million and USD10.17 million respectively.
